description:
JOIN OVER 400+ SUCCESSFUL STUDENTS WHO HAVE ALREADY TAKEN THIS COURSE!

----------

"Accomplishes 100% of what it set out to accomplish! Jake, great course! This is my second "course" that I have gone through, and man do you deliver. This set out to teach you how to make and deliver an informational product, and that's exactly what it does. By following these easy 1, 2, 3 steps (or more), you can go out today and start creating info products. Nothing is left out here. So many times I feel like a piece of the puzzle is missing in a "method" or "formula" that is taught, not here! You hit it right on the head with this one. No questions were left unanswered, you teach us how to get from step one, to step two, to step three and beyond until completion. This course took a little over 2 hours to go through all the videos. Once again -- none of this will happen unless the student takes ACTION - but you're giving the map, just follow and you will end up where at your destination! Great job. A+++" - Susan

"Excellent, engaging video course on Product Creation - I highly recommend. The course provided very detailed, step by step instructions on Product Creation. Jake is engaging and you can see how knowledgeable, engaging and passionate he is about the subject. The use of videos together with his on-camera presentation, made the course very valuable for me. I have read and watched other Products Creation courses, and this one is by far superior to them all. I have always been leary about creating my own product, but this course shows how doable the process is. I cannot say enough about the quality in this series of videos - I highly recommend it to anyone." - RoseMarie Pierre

"My view on Product Creation Formula.. I have been trying to create info products for the past few years and getting absolutely nowhere. To be honest, I'd reached my tipping point and was on the verge of giving up and going back to the nine-to-five drudge. Without trying to sound like a drama queen, Jake's course was going to be my last bash at this whole thing. I am so glad I did. At last, a course that comes in bite-size pieces and takes you through the whole process and leaves nothing out. I am now full of confidence that I can actually do this thing.. This course will help even newbies, or should I say, especially newbies. And don't forget, you can come back to it any time you're stuck, which I've done myself. It's a brilliant, step-by-step course that I highly recommend. Thank you Jake." - Ray Cowie

----------

LATEST: Course has been updated with all new material for the current Udemy market!

Start earning a truly residual income with no outlay and no technical experience needed. This is a real business model, and it should be treated like one.

Please - if you're looking for "instant easy get rich quick" money, don't take this course. You'll need to study the course and do as it shows for success, following the very simple video modules. You only need a computer and an internet connection, and you can start to earn money as soon as you complete the course.

No websites, blogs, email lists, or paid promotion is needed!

NEW! Now includes powerful bonuses that will take your Udemy business to the next level!

--------------------

My current Udemy courses have members from 119 different countries around the world!

+++++++++++++++++++++++

About this course:

  • Over 400+ very happy students
  • No website, blog, email marketing, articles or anything else is required
  • Dozens of 5 Star Reviews from VERY satisfied students
  • Full, unlimited lifetime access
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!
  • On-screen, over the shoulder view of where to go, what to click, and how I set everything up from start to finish

SEE HOW I GET:

  • Killer courses created and uploaded quickly and easily to Udemy
  • 10-20 new customers enrolling in my courses every day
  • Dozens of awesome 5-Star reviews from excited students

....with much less effort and skill than you may think!

Today, you can start to earn real money, consistently, using this course creation strategy, with no outlay whatsoever - and with ZERO prior experience!

This complete course has been taken by over 400+ students already - see the amazing reviews below!

You will need no websites, authority blogs, sales funnels, email series, paid advertising, or bulky and confusing softwares.

Follow along by looking right over my shoulder, on my screen, and see exactly how I set this up quickly and effectively, from start to finish.

The best part - Udemy is driving over 95% of my traffic and sales! And if there's any type of promotion I do myself, I'll be showing you how to copy me in this course..

You'll learn

  1. The biggest misconceptions we've been told about Info Marketing
  2. How to target the perfect niche for you, specifically
  3. The quick and easy way to create killer content
  4. The simple method to layout a quality course
  5. The details you've been wanting on how to increase conversions
  6. The psychology behind my high-converting video sales letter
  7. Methods I use to add a significant number of course sales to my account every month
  8. What to do to earn profits from a course launch
  9. How to earn a consistent and residual income
  10. How to earn a few extra hundred dollars to your income from another site without doing any more

... and much, much more!

So, you've read this far! Thank you.

Video lectures 3-8 in this course can be seen by everyone below and actually show you some of the training modules in advance

One final, very important point.

You may be struggling to run a successful online business right now, and I'm going to explain why this is happening inside this course. As you will learn, it's not your fault.

You can easily start creating your course as soon as you complete the training!

Click the 'take this course' button, top right, now ... every hour you delay is costing you money ...

-Jake
title: Create an Online Business as a Udemy Instructor - Unofficial
